title: About Defcon Expanded: 8-10 Player Mod
metaDescription: Official website for Defcon Expanded, the 8-10 player mod for DEFCON. Learn about the mod, game testers, developers, and how to contact us.

snippets.content: Defcon Expanded: The 8-10 player mod for DEFCON, months in the making.
Mod is in its infancy. Report bugs via email or Discord.
